TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BitmapSource extends System.Windows.Media.ImageSource
Public MustInherit Class BitmapSource Inherits ImageSource
public ref class BitmapSource abstract : System::Windows::Media::ImageSource
type BitmapSource = class inherit ImageSource interface DUCE.IResource

summary.span: 表示具有特定大小和分辨率的单个不变的像素集。

span.span: Represents a single, constant set of pixels at a certain size and resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的基本构建基块[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]从概念上讲表示具有特定大小和分辨率的像素的单个常量集的图像处理管道。 is the basic building block of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] imaging pipeline, conceptually representing a single, constant set of pixels at a certain size and resolution. 一个可能是提供了一个解码器，图像文件中的单个帧，也可以是对转换的结果自己。A could be a single frame in an image file that a decoder provides, or it could be the result of a transform that operates on a of its own. 不用于表示多帧图像或动画。 is not used to represent a multi-frame image or an animation. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 以本机方式支持的压缩和解压缩[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bmp-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]映像。 natively supports compression and decompression of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bmp-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] images. 对于解码方案中，位图使用自动编码解码器发现，基于用户的系统上已安装的编解码器。For bitmap decoding scenarios, uses automatic codec discovery, based on the installed codecs on the user's system. 最大高度和宽度的图像为 2 ^16 像素 32 位 / 通道 \* 4 个通道。The maximum height and width of an image is 2^16 pixels at 32 bits per channel \* 4 channels. 最大大小为 2 ^32 字节 （64 千兆字节为单位） 和最大图像大小是四个图形芯片核心填充。The maximum size of a is 2^32 bytes (64 gigabytes) and the maximum image size is four gigapixels. 最小的图像大小为 1 x 1。The minimum image size is 1x1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建并将其用作源的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a and use it as the source of an control. [!code-csharp[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapSourceCreate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/BitmapSourceExample.cs#bitmapsourcecreate)] [!code-vb[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapSourceCreate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/VB/BitmapSourceExample.vb#bitmapsourcecreate)] 下面的代码示例使用派生的类， ，若要从图像文件创建位图，然后将其用作源的控件。The following code example uses a derived class, , to create a bitmap from an image file and use it as the source of an control. [!code-csharp[imageelementexample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/SimpleImageExample.xaml.cs#simplecsharp1)] [!code-vb[imageelementexample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/SimpleImageExample.xaml.vb#simplecsharp1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它传递此方法才会成功这是从源站点，或者，定义`pack:`。This method only succeeds if it is passed a that is from a site of origin or that is defined in a `pack:`. 在所有其他情况下，此方法将失败。In all other conditions, this method will fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法隐藏继承的版本使用的强类型实现。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用基实现重写此方法。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when you call the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用而不是直接调用此方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DecodeFailed As EventHandler(Of ExceptionEventArgs)

summary.span: 在由于图像标题损坏而无法下载图像时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the image fails to load, due to a corrupt image header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage \<*object* DecodeFailed="*EventHandler*" .../>\<*object* DecodeFailed="*EventHandler*" .../>

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DownloadCompleted As EventHandler

summary.span: 在下载完位图内容时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the bitmap content has been completely downloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于所有类型的位图内容可能不会引发此事件。This event may not be raised for all types of bitmap content.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DownloadFailed As EventHandler(Of ExceptionEventArgs)

summary.span: 在无法下载位图内容时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the bitmap content failed to download.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于所有类型的位图内容可能不会引发此事件。This event may not be raised for all types of bitmap content. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage \<*对象*DownloadFailed ="*EventHandler*".../ >\<*object* DownloadFailed="*EventHandler*" .../>

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DownloadProgress As EventHandler(Of DownloadProgressEventArgs)

summary.span: 在下载位图内容的进度有变化时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the download progress of the bitmap content has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于所有类型的位图内容可能不会引发此事件。This event may not be raised for all types of bitmap content. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage \<*object* DownloadProgress="*EventHandler*" .../>\<*object* DownloadProgress="*EventHandler*" .../>
